text: Carole Richert (born 28 September 1967) is a French actress. She studied at the National Conservatory of Dramatic Arts in Paris. She played Marie-France in the series Clem, broadcast on TF1. == Personal life == Richert married her husband Daniel Rialet on 18 June 2003, with whom she has two children: Pauline, born in 1996 and Vincent, born in 2000.. Rialet died of a heart attack on April 11, 2006 at the age of forty-six. ==Filmography== ===Films=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
